players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Charlie, I noticed your behavior last night. Be careful."
Diana: "I will investigate Charlie tonight. He seemed suspicious last night and Alice noticed something off about him."
Charlie: "I think it's important to be cautious of Charlie. His behavior last night was odd, and Alice also noticed something suspicious about him."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
